name: Tumble Boyos
description:
To develop a creative and enjoyable game in 48 hours is the goal in the Game Maker's Toolkit's Game Jam.

This year I want to participate, so I practiced with last year's theme: **"Joined Together"** (I did not participate in the 2021 jam).  

The game is not good. But it works and it is open source so I'm happy.  
Find source code and references to the assets here: https://github.com/honeyMead/gmtk-2021-game-jam-practice
